body:
Hey errryone. Been a while.

So I recorded a vid today. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7-bz_BzksoA&feature=youtu.be

People complain a lot that they can't win on wild west so I figured I'd show my strategy so people can use it or use parts of it or whatever. Shows how to get full diamond plus a couple of lil extras.

Enjoy.

replies.body: But but..that's part of the excitement of playing! You learn where the good resources are..it's what makes Walls different from the other game modes. In Nebula, you mostly pvp while trying to destroy enemy monument. But in Walls, you gather stuff, explore and learn the maps, then pvp. But anyways..thanks for the video, I didn't know any of those spots :P

replies.body:
Yes, I love walls for the exploring! However not everyone likes to figure things out on their own, or they're just done figuring things out and want results :p So this is basically just my route in walls.

Im thinking of showing all of my routes on the maps I know well. Not necessarily all dia tho!
